events.title: Applications open!
events.description: We're welcoming any and all students who are looking to make a difference through tech. Applicants are not considered on a rolling basis.

events.title: Information Session 1
events.description: Come join us for a session to learn about DTI, our goals, and our subteams. There will be time to chat with DTI members of all roles after! And if you canâ€™t make this session, check out the Information Session 2 below.

events.title: Information Session 2
events.description: Another session to learn about DTI and to chat with our members. All applicants are encouraged to attend one of the information sessions.

events.title: ACSU x DTI Resume Review Session
events.description: Helping students prepare for our application by reviewing their resumes and giving them interview tips!

events.title: WICC X DTI Boba Chats
events.description: Opportunity for WICC and DTI members to learn about each other and the DTI application process in a smaller, more intimate setting!

events.title: URMC x DTI Recruitment Workshop
events.description: Includes collaborative discussions on diversity in both DTI and URMC, as well as preparing for DTI's application with resume reviews and interview tips!

events.title: Get to Know the DTI'ers
events.description: Get to know DTI and its members through casual chats, games, product demos, and get your resume reviewed!

events.title: Applications due
events.description: We're welcoming any and all students who are looking to make a difference through tech. Applicants are not considered on a rolling basis.

events.title: Behavioral Interviews
events.description: Prepare to talk about past projects, teamwork experiences, and your motivation for joining DTI.

events.title: Technical Interviews
events.description: Demonstrate your technical skills through problem-solving challenges relevant to your subteam.
